legal_basis: s. 83(1) of the Canada Pension Plan
decision_reasoning: Board erred in granting the extension without considering prejudice or requiring sufficient evidence
procedure_followed: Judicial review application by the Minister
result_of_case: Court allowed the judicial review, set aside the Board's decision, and remanded the case for re-determination
cause_of_action: Respondent's request for an appeal extension seven years after the deadline due to personal issues
